name: Masketta Man
description:
Masketta Man is a neckless individual that exists simultaneously in 3 different realities. With the power of his masks he can inhabit each in turn. Will you help Masketta Man escape this hellscape of mostly unrelated free assets?

Green Mask has the power to double-jump

Blue Mask has the power to summon minions and use them to activate gates

Red Mask has the power to bonk

Controls:

Arrow Keys to move

Space to jump

Z to use your Mask Ability

X and C to swap between masks

M to mute the game

Made for the 2nd VTuber Game Jam

using Kenney Game Assets' Pixel Platformer and Retro Sounds packs
